summary: All six requirements (REQ-42 through REQ-47) are fully implemented. The DoctorsSection component was created with three doctor profiles, integrated into HomePage between WhyChooseUsSection and TestimonialsSection, HeroSection received a background image, ServicesSection and WhyChooseUsSection display dental equipment and patient-doctor images, and all images reference the /assets/generated/ path with appropriate alt text.

hallucinated_features.description: Doctor specialization titles added to profile cards (Chief Dental Surgeon, Orthodontist & Implant Specialist, Endodontist & Cosmetic Dentist)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly state 'Adding actual doctor biography or credential details beyond names' should not be done, yet specialization titles were added
